post:
V.PS has a Great Domain and Nice Prices in Seven Datacenters Around the World!

amsterdam, Dusseldorf, estonia, Frankfurt, germany, hong kong, netherlands, new york, seattle, v.ps June 18, 2021 @ 12:00 am, by raindog308

Welcome, V.PS!  Congrats on getting such a great domain and thanks for the offer for our readers.

They’re a Estonian/German company that has service in seven different datacenters around the world: Amsterdam, Frankvurt, Düsseldorf, Tallinn (Estonia), Seattle, New York, and Hong Kong.  Plus there’s a 20% off couple for LEB readers!

Their WHOIS is public. They are registered in Estonia (xTom OÜ, VAT ID EE102118926) and Germany (xTom GmbH, VAT ID DE815833022). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site (AUP).. They accept Paypal, Credit Cards via Stripe, SEPA and Bank Transfer. For some countries, they support specific local payment methods like Alipay, Bancontact, EPS, Giropay, iDEAL, Multibanco, Sofort and Przelewy24..

Here’s a little about V.PS in their own words:

“xTom Group (https://xtom.com/) has several companies registered locally around the world, including xTom GmbH in Germany, xTom Pty Ltd in Australia, xTom Hong Kong Limited in Hong Kong, xTom OÜ in Estonia.

We offer server colocation, dedicated servers, IP transit since 2012. Now we launched our VPS products at https://v.ps/

We also provide free open source mirrors service in several locations https://xtom.com/mirrors/

Another project is our free public DNS resolver DNS.SB (https://dns.sb/), our DoH service is integrated with Google Chrome.”

If you decide to give V.PS a try, please tell others how it goes in the comments below.

Now read more to see the offers!
